description:
<p>The Walton Centre is the only integrated Neuroscience Trust in the UK. Based in Liverpool, it unites all specialties under one roof and provides one of the most comprehensive ranges of Neuroscience services in the UK. The Trust provides services to around 3 million people, mainly from the North West, North Wales and the Isle of Man, but also from across the UK.</p>
<p>We are looking for a highly motivated and enthusiastic individual to provide comprehensive administration and secretarial support within the neurology secretariat division. The post holder will demonstrate excellent organisational, communication and typing skills. The post holder will need to be experienced and flexible with excellent organisational and secretarial skills. The role requires excellent word processing skills and computer literacy. They will need to regularly meet tight deadlines and maintain standards relating to administrative processes. Knowledge and experience of Winscribe would be advantageous but not essential.</p>
title: Support Secretary
